I'm Aniket. I love to code, listen to music and I even write free-verses at times. A majority of my work is writing syntax for design.

By Aniket Pant

About Me

Aniket Pant me@aniketpant.com aniketpant.com

That's me

Howdy!

Hey, I am Aniket and I have been around on the web since 2010. It’s not long but it been quite an adventure since then. In all this time I have worked with various web frameworks and nowadays I am experimenting with Ruby.

So, what all do I do?

I love to code. I guess there is no doubt about it. And if you still are a bit skeptical, then checkout my Github profile.

Although, a majority of my work is writing syntax for design.

I also love to speak. Though I haven’t done this quite frequently but you might want to call me to your conference someday.

Along with all of the above, I am also the Curator of Mark My Word, which is India’s First Content & Design Conference.

Initiate contact

Just go ahead and follow me on Twitter. If you're afraid of that, then you can drop me a mail. If you're looking for my codes, then you can fork my repositories on Github.
